title: DaNNy001
author: DaNNy001
content: It has not been easy for those Ukrainian soldier holding the fight against Russia  and  now the EU and UK have decided to step up and aid them in various ways possible they feel they lack especially coming to this winter season According to British secretary of defense Ben Wallace. He stated that "the United Kingdom would step up for the Ukrainian soldiers as they brace for a tough Winter of conflict" by providing them with the necessary gadgets and tools needed during their war against Russia The Uk are also planning  to make an additional supply of 1000 surface to air missiles to help the Ukrainian in stopping the incoming drones from Russia in helping them fight the war.https://naijaonpoint.com.ng/russia-should-be-scared-europe-is-sending-more-weapons-to-ukraine/
